sentences.en: (= water that comes out of a tap ) is usually heavily treated with chemicals.
sentences.cn: 自来水一般都用化学品严格处理过。

sentences.en: A tap on the door interrupted him and Sally Pierce came in.
sentences.cn: 敲门声打断了他，萨莉·皮尔斯走了进来。

sentences.en: beer on tap.
sentences.cn: 盛放在带龙头的酒桶中的啤酒

sentences.en: extra personnel on tap.
sentences.cn: 处于待命状态的编外人员

sentences.en: He gave a tap at the microphone before speaking.
sentences.cn: 他在讲话前先轻叩了一下扩音器.

sentences.en: He has money on tap.
sentences.cn: 他手头有现金.

sentences.en: He never drinks tap water.
sentences.cn: 他从不喝自来水。

sentences.en: He tapped the table nervously with his fingers.
sentences.cn: 他紧张地用手指轻轻地敲打桌子。

sentences.en: He turned as someone tapped him on the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 有人轻轻拍了拍他的肩膀，他转过身来。

sentences.en: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.cn: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

sentences.en: Is the tap water safe to drink?
sentences.cn: 这自来水喝了不会闹病吧？

sentences.en: People are tapping into the power supply illegally.
sentences.cn: 人们在非法取电。

sentences.en: She felt a tap on her shoulder.
sentences.cn: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.en: She was always on the tap , borrowing sugar and milk.
sentences.cn: 她借了糖又借牛奶,老是伸手要东西.

sentences.en: She went into the bathroom and turned on the taps .
sentences.cn: 她走进浴室，打开水龙头。

sentences.en: Tap each one firmly on your work surface to settle the mixture.
sentences.cn: 在工作台上逐个轻轻敲紧，让混合物变得密实。

sentences.en: Tap the lid down carefully so as not to break the contents.
sentences.cn: 要把盖子轻轻地敲下去,免得把里面的东西打碎.

sentences.en: Tap water is drinkable everywhere in the Algarve.
sentences.cn: 阿尔加维各地的自来水都可饮用。

sentences.en: Tap your cheeks all over with the pads of your fingers.
sentences.cn: 用手指头肚儿轻拍脸颊一遍。

sentences.en: The pass left Zidane with a simple tap-in.
sentences.cn: 这个传球使齐达内将球轻松踢进门。

sentences.en: They worried about the purity of tap water.
sentences.cn: 他们担心自来水是否纯净。

sentences.en: Water splashed into the bucket from the tap.
sentences.cn: 水从龙头里喷溅着注入水池.

sentences.en: We hope that additional sources of funding can be tapped.
sentences.cn: 我们希望还有其他资金来源可以利用。

sentences.en: We've got all the information permanently on tap on a computer.
sentences.cn: 我们把所有的信息储存在计算机里,以便随时调用.

sentences.en: You must have left a tap running in the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 你肯定忘了关浴室的龙头了。

words.tran_cn: 抽头的；分接的；发接触音的
[冶] 出钢；开孔；出渣；轻敲声

phrases.tran_cn: 立刻可以使用的；准备好的
n. 螺丝攻；螺旋式水龙头；丝锥
抽头转换开关；分接头变换器
[篮球]托球入篮；[高尔夫]将很短的推击击球入洞；按键输入

trans.tran_cn: 龙头，阀门，轻击/拍/敲，电话窃听
trans.tran_en: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
a piece of equipment for controlling the flow of water, gas etc from a pipe or container

trans.tran_cn: 轻敲/拍/叩，利用，开发，窃听，委任，指定，敲节拍
trans.tran_en: to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention
an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
